column4: is there a good gui frontend for dd?  I've tried looking for one to no avail
: a front end for dd? rofl
ummm, whats so funny?
I want a gui
: man dd and dd if=/dev/zero of=image.img bs=1M count=699 should get you off
haha, very funny
: if you use dd for anything, then you dont need a front end.. dd just aint a GUI tool
there is a GUI with the Helix CD
I can't find one fore debian
and I use the cl myself, but for other people I know
: what you need a gui for? read the man page and type the command? and what can you use dd tho that reguired a gui?
....don't be a troll, I said for other people, namely those who are less linux-savvy
: but for what can non-linux-savvy use dd for?
backing up their HDD
I asked for a dd frontend, not for an argument
: then install the one Helix CD has and i'm not argumenting, look @ freshmeat.net for a GUI
you disagree with a gui frontend, thats fine, thats enough
: and i think there are btter backup solutions.
I did
: just a strange question, if you need a gui great, just wondered why
yeah, I understand, I just didn't want an argument is all, I'm at work
maybe later we can duke it out :)
